_header: And of this seed that Satan sawes / A good tale
Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle ; Devil as Physician
_description: The Devil as Physician, in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
A holy hermett som tym þer wasþat wond alon in þe
                    west place…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…ffrom þat sed crist vs defend& grawnt vs all
                    þat blys þat meuer sall end

BodAsh42.First Lines:
& of þis sede þat sathan sawesA gude tale saynte
                    Ierome schawes…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde ihesus vs þidir bringeAmen amen i rede we
                    synge
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
And of þat seed þat sathan soweþA good tale seint
                    Jerom schoweþ…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesu þider vs bringeAmen Amen alle we
                    synge
BodEngPoeta1.Note:
This MS separates 5982
                    and 528 two lines later, beginning 528, ‘Off an hermyte an holy
                    mon…’.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Hou macarye say þe deuel beryng his boystes (f. 177rc;
                    preceding ‘Off An hermyt an holy mon’)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 255-6.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
And howe þe fende sawes þis sedeÞis tale telles
                    Ierome als we redeAn holy heremyte he sais it wasÞat woned alone
                    in a waste place…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Pray we to god with prayere myldeþat fro his sede vs
                    alle he scheldeAnd þat he noght vpon vs steleWith gostly dra[ ]ke
                    & with darueleﬂffro þat sede crist vs defendeand graunte vs
                    blisse þat neuer sale ende
CULAdd8335.Note:
Break between preceding text, 5982, and this comes two lines later in this MS, at
                    ‘An holy heremyte…’.
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Narracio de quodam heremita vidente diabolum euntem ad temptandum
                        religiosos (p. 77)

CULDd11.First Lines:
& of þat sede þat sathan sowiþa good tale ierom
                    þe wise schewiþOff an holi Ermyte in Romeþat wonid in
                    wildernes him selfe alone…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…oure lord ihesu thedir vs bringeAmen amen alle we
                    singe
CULDd11.Note:
Break between preceding text, 5982, and this comes two lines later in this MS, at
                    ‘Off an holi Ermyte…’.

CULGg531.First Lines:
Of þis sede þat þat satane sawesA gud
                    talle Ierom vs schewesOf a ermyte a haly maneÞat woned in
                    wyldernes by hym ane…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde Ihesu þeder vs bryngeAmen amen sall we all
                    synge
CULGg531.Note:
Break between preceding text, 5982, and this comes two lines later in this MS, at
                    ‘Of a ermyte…’.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Of þis sede þat sathan sawesA gude tall ȝerom vs
                    schewes…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde ihesus þedir vs bryngeAmen amen sall we all
                    synge

BLHar2391.First Lines: Of an hermit a holy manþat wond in wyddirnes allan…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …Owr lord Ihesu crist vs ȝedir bryngAmen Amen I red we syng
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica v (left margin, f. 168v), plus “A tale” written above this

EDCPCM.First Lines:
and of þis sede þat satan sawesA god tal sain Ierom us
                    schawes…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…Our lauerd iesus þider us bringAmen amen we alle
                    sing
EDCPCM.Editions:
Small,  John,
                        ed.  
             English Metrical Homilies….
         Edinburgh: W. Paterson, 1862: 148-52.
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
& off þis sede þat Sathane sawesa gude tale Saynte
                    Ierome schawes…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde ihesu vs þider bryngAmen amen I rede we all
                    syng

HunHM129.First Lines:
And off þis sede þat sathanas sowythA gode tale seint
                    ierome vs schowyth…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Oure loueryd ihesu þeddyr vs bryngeAmen I red we all
                    synge
